    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DatabasaQuery()
    This is the constructor of the class DatabasaQuery, which creates an instance of the DatabaseConnect class (dataConnect) and is used to establish a connection to the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabasaQuery

      public DatabasaQuery() throws SQLException
      This is the constructor of the class DatabasaQuery, which creates an instance of the DatabaseConnect class (dataConnect) and is used to establish a connection to the database. It throws an exception of type SQLException in case of an error while connecting to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkAdmin

      public boolean checkAdmin(int staffID)
      This method checks if the input staff ID is in the "admin" table in the database. It does this by preparing and executing a SQL query that selects all columns from the "admin" table where the "staff_Id" column is equal to the input staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID -
      Returns:
